Articles.Content:
Hello, Kerbonauts!

I have created three planes worthy of showing everyone with the wish to fly them. Two are biplanes, one that uses the damned aerospace mod, and one completely stock. The remaining one is a stock representation of an A-10a.

First: The biplane. (NOTE: this is the one that uses Damned Aerospace)

This plane is VERY easy to control. It takes off at about 20 m/s. Due to the amount of lift it has, it can glide for miles if you do it right.

Second: Biplane with turbines, for all who don\'t use Damned Aerospace.

A little bit harder to fly than the first biplane, because of the weight up front. It has a takeoff speed of about 40 m/s

Third: The A-10. This may just be the best looking plane I\'ve made, but I\'m sure everyone else can do better ;D

The hardest of these three to fly (yet somehow still easy), It handles marginally worse than the real life A-10. It has a takeoff speed of around 100 m/s and glides like a boulder.
